Returns an {{rlp|iterator}} to the first element of the {{tt|elements_view}}.

Let {{rlpi|/#Data members|base_}} be the underlying view.

@1@ Equivalent to {{c|1=return /*iterator*/&lt;false&gt;(ranges::begin(base_));}}.
@2@ Equivalent to {{c|1=return /*iterator*/&lt;true&gt;(ranges::begin(base_));}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
Iterator to the first element.
